metadata.name: Always was, always will be?
metadata.description:
Russia is sick with russism. russism, much like fascism ( vial in the middle), is spreading around the world. It is a plague of XXIst century (vial with the capital Z). The virus challenging the human kind. The history’s cycle is repeating itself and we shouldn’t repeat the errors of previous generations. Not only should the well considered actions be taken, but the appearance of new mortal, empires of evil (the vial on the left with an empty tag) should be avoided. We are the only ones to decide what symbol will be displayed on the left vial, or if there will be any. The money received from NFT selling will be spend on the deveopment and publishing of new NFT for this collection and for support of Ukrainian military forces, which are restraining russia.

The first owner of the NFT will get:

- Printed image (580x325 mm ) signed by the autor, under the glass protection, to decorate your wall with;

- PNG file on digital support in special packaging.
